## Description
Na2CO3, also called washing soda,&#10;&#9;&#9;soda ash and soda crystals, is the water-soluble sodium salt of carbonic acid&#10;&#9;

## Characteristics

| Attribute      | Value |
|--------:|:------|
|Edible:|false|
|Type:|Compound|
|Form:|Solid|
